verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Avenge<WH5358> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for the Midianites.<WH4084> Afterward<WH310> you shall be gathered<WH622> to your people.<WH5971>"

Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "Arm<WH2502> men<WH582> from among you for the war,<WH6635> that they may go against Midian,<WH4080> to execute Yahweh<WH3068>'s vengeance<WH5414> on Midian.<WH4080>
Of every tribe<WH4294> one thousand,<WH505> throughout all the tribes<WH4294> of Israel,<WH3478> you shall send<WH7971> to the war.<WH6635>"
So there were delivered,<WH4560> out of the thousands<WH505> of Israel,<WH3478> a thousand<WH505> of every tribe,<WH4294> twelve<WH8147> thousand<WH505> armed<WH2502> for war.<WH6635>

Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> them,<WH505> one thousand of every tribe,<WH4294> to the war,<WH6635> them and Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> to the war,<WH6635> with the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> and the trumpets<WH2689> for the alarm<WH8643> in his hand.<WH3027>
They warred<WH6633> against Midian,<WH4080> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses;<WH4872> and they killed<WH2026> every male.<WH2145>

They killed<WH2026> the kings<WH4428> of Midian<WH4080> with<WH5921> the rest of their slain:<WH2491> Evi,<WH189> and Rekem,<WH7552> and Zur,<WH6698> and Hur,<WH2354> and Reba,<WH7254> the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of Midian:<WH4080> Balaam<WH1109> also the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> they killed<WH2026> with the sword.<WH2719>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took captive<WH7617> the women<WH802> of Midian<WH4080> and their little ones;<WH2945> and all their livestock,<WH929> and all their flocks,<WH4735> and all their goods,<WH2428> they took for a prey.<WH962>
All their cities<WH5892> in the places in which they lived,<WH4186> and all their encampments,<WH2918> they burnt with fire.<WH784>
They took<WH3947> all the spoil,<WH7998> and all the prey,<WH4455> both of man<WH120> and of animal.<WH929>

They brought<WH935> the captives,<WH7628> and the prey,<WH4455> and the spoil,<WH7998> to Moses,<WH4872> and to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and to the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to the camp<WH4264> at the plains<WH6160> of Moab,<WH4124> which are by the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho.<WH3405>
Moses,<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and all the princes<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> went forth<WH3318> to meet<WH7125> them outside<WH2351> of the camp.<WH4264>

Moses<WH4872> was angry<WH7107> with the officers<WH6485> of the army,<WH2428> the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> who came<WH935> from<WH6635> the service of the war.<WH4421>
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them,<WH2421> "Have you saved all the women<WH5347> alive?<WH2421>

Behold,<WH2007> these caused<WH1961> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> through the counsel<WH1697> of Balaam,<WH1109> to commit<WH4560> trespass<WH4604> against Yahweh<WH3068> in the matter<WH1697> of Peor,<WH6465> and so the plague<WH4046> was among the congregation<WH5712> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Now therefore kill<WH2026> every male<WH2145> among the little ones,<WH2945> and kill<WH2026> every woman<WH802> who has known<WH3045> man<WH376> by lying<WH4904> with him.<WH2145>
But all the<WH802> girls,<WH2945> who have not known<WH3045> man<WH2145> by lying<WH4904> with him,<WH2421> keep alive for yourselves.

"Encamp<WH2583> outside<WH2351> of the camp<WH4264> seven<WH7651> days:<WH3117> whoever has killed<WH2026> any person,<WH5315> and whoever has touched<WH5060> any slain,<WH2491> purify<WH2398> yourselves on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> you and your captives.<WH7628>

As to every garment,<WH899> and all that is made<WH3627> of skin,<WH5785> and all work<WH4639> of goats<WH5795>' hair,<WH3627> and all things made of wood,<WH6086> you shall purify yourselves.<WH2398>"

Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to the men<WH582> of war<WH6635> who went<WH935> to the battle,<WH4421> "This is the statute<WH2708> of the law<WH8451> which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> Moses:<WH4872>
however the gold,<WH2091> and the silver,<WH3701> the brass,<WH5178> the iron,<WH1270> the tin,<WH913> and the lead,<WH5777>

everything<WH1697> that may withstand<WH935> the fire,<WH784> you shall make to go through<WH5674> the fire,<WH784> and it shall be clean;<WH2891> nevertheless it shall be purified<WH2398> with the water<WH4325> for impurity:<WH5079> and all that doesn't<WH935> withstand the fire<WH784> you shall make to go through<WH5674> the water.<WH4325>
You shall wash<WH3526> your clothes<WH899> on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> and you shall be clean;<WH2891> and afterward<WH310> you shall come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Take<WH5375> the sum<WH7218> of the prey<WH4455> that was taken,<WH7628> both of man<WH120> and of animal,<WH929> you,<WH499> and Eleazar the priest,<WH3548> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' households of the congregation;<WH5712>
and divide<WH2673> the prey<WH4455> into two parts:<WH2673> between the men skilled<WH8610> in war,<WH4421> who went out<WH3318> to battle,<WH6635> and all the congregation.<WH5712>

Levy<WH7311> a tribute<WH4371> to Yahweh<WH3068> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> who went out<WH3318> to battle:<WH6635> one<WH259> soul<WH5315> of five<WH2568> hundred;<WH3967> of the persons,<WH120> of the cattle,<WH1241> of the donkeys,<WH2543> and of the flocks.<WH6629>
Take<WH3947> it of their half,<WH4276> and give<WH5414> it to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> for Yahweh<WH3068>'s wave offering.<WH8641>

Of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>'s half,<WH4276> you shall take<WH3947> one<WH259> drawn<WH259> out of every fifty,<WH2572> of the persons,<WH120> of the cattle,<WH1241> of the donkeys,<WH2543> and of the flocks,<WH6629> of all the livestock,<WH929> and give<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> who perform<WH8104> the duty<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> did<WH6213> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Now the prey,<WH957> over and above<WH3499> the booty<WH4455> which the men of<WH5971> war<WH6635> took,<WH962> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> - five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> sheep,<WH6629>
and seventy<WH7657> - two thousand<WH505> head of cattle,<WH1241>
and sixty<WH8346> - one<WH259> thousand<WH505> donkeys,<WH2543>
and thirty<WH7970> - two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> persons<WH5315> in all,<WH3605> of the women<WH802> who had not known<WH3045> man<WH2145> by lying with him.<WH4904>

The half,<WH4275> which was the portion<WH2506> of those who went out<WH3318> to war,<WH6635> was in number<WH4557> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> - seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> sheep:<WH6629>
and Yahweh<WH3068>'s tribute<WH4371> of the sheep<WH6629> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> - five.
The cattle<WH1241> were thirty<WH7970> - six<WH8337> thousand;<WH505> of which Yahweh<WH3068>'s tribute<WH4371> was Seventy<WH7657> - two.
The donkeys<WH2543> were thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred;<WH3967> of which Yahweh<WH3068>'s tribute<WH4371> was sixty<WH8346> - one.<WH259>
The persons<WH120> were sixteen<WH8337> thousand;<WH505> of whom Yahweh<WH3068>'s tribute<WH4371> was thirty<WH7970> - two<WH8147> persons.<WH5315>
Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> the tribute,<WH4371> which was Yahweh<WH3068>'s wave offering,<WH8641> to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>'s half,<WH4276> which Moses<WH4872> divided<WH2673> off from the men<WH582> who warred<WH6633>
(now the congregation<WH5712>'s half<WH4275> was three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> - seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> <WH4480> sheep,<WH6629>
and thirty<WH7970> - six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> head of cattle,<WH1241>
and thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> donkeys,<WH2543>
and sixteen<WH8337> thousand<WH505> persons<WH5315>),

even of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>'s half,<WH4276> Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> one<WH259> drawn<WH270> out of every fifty,<WH2572> both of man<WH120> and of animal,<WH929> and gave<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> who performed<WH4931> the duty<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of Yahweh;<WH3068> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

The officers<WH6485> who were over the thousands<WH505> of the army,<WH6635> the captains<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> came near<WH7126> to Moses;<WH4872>

and they said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Your servants<WH5650> have taken<WH5375> the sum<WH7218> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> who are under our command,<WH3027> and there lacks<WH6485> not one man of us.<WH376>

We have brought<WH7126> Yahweh<WH3068>'s offering,<WH7133> what every man<WH376> has gotten,<WH4672> of jewels<WH3627> of gold,<WH2091> armlets,<WH685> and bracelets,<WH6781> signet rings,<WH2885> earrings,<WH5694> and necklaces,<WH3558> to make atonement<WH3722> for our souls<WH5315> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>"
Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> their gold,<WH2091> even all worked<WH4639> jewels.<WH3627>

All the gold<WH2091> of the wave offering<WH8641> that they offered up<WH7311> to Yahweh,<WH3068> of the captains<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and of the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> was sixteen<WH8337> thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> shekels.<WH8255>
(The men<WH582> of war<WH6635> had taken booty,<WH962> every man for himself.<WH582>)

Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the gold<WH2091> of the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and of hundreds,<WH3967> and brought<WH935> it into the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> for a memorial<WH2146> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
